name: Bobby's World
description:
Bobby's World is an action, adventure and platformer game developed by Riedel Software Productions. It was originally released in 1994. It was published by Hi Tech Expressions. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Bobby's World is available on SNES.
Gary Conrad and Mitch Schauer produced the game. Don McGinnis (orchestrations), John Tesh (1990–1993), Mark Koval (1993–1998) and Robby Merkin (musical director) scored the game.
